name: Antediluvian Ascent
description:
You are Sud, you are at the bottom of an elevator shaft, with rocks falling from above. Keep your elevator platform running smoothly by clearing rocks from it and chucking them off the side. Protect your duck by moving it out of harm's way. Don’t let one rock fall on top of another.

How to play:

A & D for movement

E for grab/Interact

How to win:

Reach the top of the shaft with your duck

How to lose:

Allow rocks to pile up on top of each  other, breaking the platform

Get crushed by a falling rock

Through inaction allow you duck to get crushed
